Class DatabaseHandler

java.lang.Object
DatabaseHandler
public class DatabaseHandler extends Object
This class is used to initialize, update, refresh database between temporary database from application and SQL database from server
See Also:
  • DatabaseHandler

  • Method Details

    • setUpHashMap

      public static void setUpHashMap()
      This function set up all HashMap from member variable by pulling data from Database containing data imported from SQL.
      See Also:
      • setUpHashMap()

    • run_SQL_Command

      public static boolean run_SQL_Command(String tableName, String command)
      This function is used to update table if there is new data needed to be added to database
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of table which will be updated
      command - Command line used to update table
      Returns:
      return the boolean: Fail means not success, True means success
      See Also:
      • run_SQL_Command(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)
